summary: Holly and Sandy strike up an instant friendship; they don't know however that they have more in common than they'd like. When tragedy strikes, their relationship is tested.
cast: Mary Tyler Moore|Julie Payne|Beverly Sanders|Salome Jens|Ted Danson|Read Morgan|Christine Lahti|Sam Waterston|Susan Rinell|Timothy Gibbs|Diane Stilwell|James MacKrell|Chet Collins|Castulo Guerra|Mark Blum|Terri Hanauer|Helene Winston|Gary Riley|Leda Siskind|Joshua Harris|Robert Kino|Lisle Wilson|John Terry Bell|Jane Greer|George Wallace|Andra Akers|Robert Rothwell|Darwyn Carson|Lewis Arquette|Brigitte Desper|Tiffany Desper|Dorothy Francis|Suzanne Wishner|Jeannie Elias|Christina Kokubo|Leslie Ann Rieder|Cynthia Lea Clark
title: Entre amigas
